How many people are affected by myoclonus-dystonia ?,The prevalence of myoclonus-dystonia is unknown. This condition has been described in people worldwide.,GHR,myoclonus-dystonia
What are the genetic changes related to myoclonus-dystonia ?,"Mutations in the SGCE gene cause myoclonus-dystonia. The SGCE gene provides instructions for making a protein called epsilon ()-sarcog
